conclusion_statement.content: We'll transfer you now. Please hold for a professional.

rejection_statement.content: Sorry, I am not able to assist at this time.

value_elicitation_prompt.content:
Do you accept our Terms and Conditions? https://kellimni.com/chat-terms/ .Please answer with a number: 
1. Yes, I accept the terms and conditions. 
2. No, I don't accept the terms and conditions.
